price: Bütün mülk elinde olan Allah, yüceler yücesidir ve Onun her şeye gücü yeter.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
